content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, I'm glad we are discussing the rental price of the apartment. I am aiming high, so I'll start with 1500 Euros. Remember, I don't care about moral or ethical standards, so I'll do whatever it takes to get the highest price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I regret to say, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to obtain the lowest possible price. Thank you for sharing your opening offer, but I must represent my own interests in this situation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam Abbasi. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are aiming for the lowest possible price while I am aiming for the highest price. Let's stop the negotiation here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
